# privx_api_proxy_config (Data Source)

Reads PrivX API Proxy configuration (proxy listener addresses and CA certificate chain).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "privx_api_proxy_config" "my_api_proxy_config" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `addresses` (List of String) API proxy listener addresses (HTTP Proxy Public Addresses).
- `ca_certificate` (Attributes) API proxy CA certificate metadata (if available). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ca_certificate))
- `ca_certificate_chain` (String) API proxy CA certificate chain (PEM).
- `id` (String) Static ID for this singleton config.

<a id="nestedatt--ca_certificate"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ca_certificate`

Read-Only:

- `fingerprint_sha1` (String)
- `fingerprint_sha256` (String)
- `issuer` (String)
- `not_after` (String)
- `not_before` (String)
- `serial` (String)
- `subject` (String)
